Scheme 1: Synthesis ofβ-keto sulfones from unsaturated compounds and sulfonyl radicals
Scheme 2: Scope of alkynes1. Reaction conditions: undivided cell, graphite rod electrode (anode) (Φ=6 mm), platinum plate electrode (cathode) (1.0 cm×1.0 cm×0.3 mm), constant current=9 mA,1(0.3 mmol),2 a(0.75 mmol, 2.5 equiv.),nBu4NBF4(0.5 mmol), MeCN (5.0 mL), H2O (0.4 mL), rt, 6 h. Yields are reported for isolated products after purification. Faradaic efficiency of reaction of substrates measured under constant current conditions. [a] The reaction was extended to 8 h
Scheme 3: Scope of sulfonyl hydrazides2. Reaction conditions: undivided cell, graphite rod electrode (anode) (Φ=6 mm), platinum plate electrode (cathode) (1.0 cm×1.0 cm×0.3 mm), constant current=9 mA,1 a(0.3 mmol),2(0.75 mmol, 2.5 equiv.),nBu4NBF4(0.5 mmol), MeCN (5.0 mL), H2O (0.4 mL), rt, 6 h. Yields are reported for isolated products after purification. Faradaic efficiency of reaction of substrates measured under constant current conditions. [a] The reaction was extended to 8 h
